positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of both command-level and MapReduce timeout configurations
Clear distinction between simple timeouts (numeric only) and MapReduce timeouts (env var support)
Accurate documentation of TimeoutConfig struct fields and defaults
Correct TimeoutPolicy enum values and their behaviors
Correct TimeoutAction enum values and their effects
Good progression from simple to advanced configuration
Accurate YAML syntax examples for all features
improvement_suggestions: Add troubleshooting section for common timeout issues
Include example of combining multiple timeout features together
Add cross-reference to DLQ documentation for timeout_action: dlq behavior
Consider adding a visual diagram showing timeout flow
